mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{productName},category_code=#{categoryCode},product_price=#{productPrice},product_stock=#{productStock},product_desc=#{productDesc} where shop_code=#{shopCode} and product_code=#{productCode}
mapper.select: select od.product_code,sum(od.order_amount) "countOrder" from orders o,orders_detail od where o.order_code=od.order_code and o.shop_code=#{shopCode} and o.order_state=0 group by od.product_code order by od.product_code asc
mapper.delete: delete from product where shop_code=#{shopCode} and product_code=#{productCode}
mapper.select: select count(product_name) from product where shop_code=#{shopCode} and product_name=#{productName}
